title: Topic 006 Question 002
body: A company configures an Azure site-to-site VPN between an on-premises network and an Azure virtual network.
The company reports that after completing the configuration, the VPN connection cannot be established.
You need to troubleshoot the connection issue.
options: Identify the shared key by running this PowerShell cmdlet: Get-AzVirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionSharedKey.
Identify the shared key by running the PowerShell cmdlet: Get -AzVirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionVpnDeviceConfigScript
